repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: The manuscript is of the Tarkaprakāśa, a commentary written on the Nyāyasiddhāntamañjarī. The manuscript ends at the beggining of the śabdakhaṇḍa of the Tarkaprakāśa.

msItem.title: Nyāyasiddhāntamañjarīṭīkā (Tarkaprakāśa)
msItem.author: Śrikaṇṭha

filiation.p: Aufrecht Catalogus vol.3: p-66 New Catalogus Catalogorum vol.10: pp- 274--275.

msItem.rubric: (1v 1) sandhyāyāḥ praṇati kṣaṇe gitijayāserṣyaṃ samālokite roṣaṃ mānini mākuthā svadaparānānyāsti vamdyā mama kiṃ nu tvāmahamānamānimatasiddhānvā tayaivākṛtī(not legible 1 letter) tyaṃ harṣa (1v 2) ta śelarājatanayā dṛṣṭaḥ śivaḥ pātu naḥ . 1
msItem.explicit: (142r 4) numitismṛtināṃ vāraṇāya samya? tatrādeśinām pratyakṣatvādināṃ satvāt

support.p: palm leaf guard folio at the beginning. Layer at the left corner of the leaf is broken.

extent.measure: 1 guard folio, 3 balnk folio at the beginning and 142 written folio.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numeration in left margin on the verso of the folio.
supportDesc.condition: Good state of preservation. Some margins are slightly broken.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṃ is written in the left margin on 1v.

Number 31 is written in pink pencil on the front guard folio. 3 lines are carved in granth script but a sticker is glued so it is not readable. line 1 [..........?] namaḥ line 2 pratyakṣānumānopamāna [evaṃ?] line 3 [prakaraṇakroḍaṃ taraṃgiṇi ca tatraiva?]

listBibl.bibl: bhaṭṭācārya cūḍāmaṇi jānakinātha viracitā paṇḍitavaranīlakaṇṭhadīkṣitapraṇīta bṛhattarkaprakāśābhidhayā vyākhyayā sametā kāśīsthasuprasiddhabrahmāmṛtavarṣiṇīsamāsamyādakapaṇḍitavaraśrīrāmamiśraśāstriṇāmantevāsinā naiyāyikena śrīgaurīnāthaśāstriṇā pariśodhitā śrīkāśyāṃ rāmāpurāsthāmara yantrālaye śrīmadambikācaraṇa caṭhṭhopādhyāyena mudritā saṃvat 1941

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words. Question mark is used to show illegible letter.

TEI.text:
(1v 1) sandhyāyāḥ praṇati kṣaṇe gitijayāserṣyaṃ samālokite roṣaṃ mānini mākuthā svadaparānānyāsti vamdyā mama kiṃ nu tvāmahamānamānimatasiddhānvā tayaivākṛtī(not legible 1 letter) tyaṃ harṣa (1v 2) ta śelarājatanayā dṛṣṭaḥ śivaḥ pātu naḥ . 1 siddhāntagūḍha varṣaikabhāvanāpariśīlatā śrikaṃṭanirmitā seyaṃ kṛtirātanutānmudaṃ .2
(142r 2) gauraveṇa bhāvāditi saṃkṣepaḥ .. iti bhaṭṭācāryaviracitāyāṃ siddhāntamañjiryāmupamānaparicchedaḥ …. atha śābdo nirupyato śabdapramitikaraṇam ….. (142r 4) numitismṛtināṃ vāraṇāya samya? tatrādeśinām pratyakṣatvādināṃ satvāt
